text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ',concat('''',variables('fileName'),''''),',
	FILE_NAME_SYNC = ',concat('''',variables('fileNameSync'),''''),',
	FILE_PATH = ''',variables('movePath'),''',
	STATUS = ''P'',
	WHERE DATA_ID =',string(first(first(activity('insert CC_DATA_FACTORY onprocess').output.resultSets).rows).DATA_ID),';')
